title: Hypothesis driven development with Application Insights
abstract:
‘I think the user will…’, ‘I don’t think the user will…’. Stop guessing.

‘This API is used…’, ‘this one is not….’. Stop speculating.

Here, I will demonstrate the power of Application insights to increase performance, relevance and usability for your users. Stop guessing, stop speculating and start using real information to make your product better.
